propDescriptions.badgeContent: The content rendered within the badge.
propDescriptions.children: The badge will be added relative to this node.
propDescriptions.component: The component used for the root node. Either a string to use a HTML element or a component.
propDescriptions.showZero: Controls whether the badge is hidden when badgeContent is zero.
propDescriptions.slotProps: The props used for each slot inside the Badge.
propDescriptions.slots: The components used for each slot inside the Badge. Either a string to use a HTML element or a component. See Slots API below for more details.

root.description: Class name applied to the root element.

slotDescriptions.root: The component that renders the root.
slotDescriptions.badge: The component that renders the badge.
